meanings.definition: To allow oneself too much of something enjoyable, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: She kept overindulging in sweets and felt sick afterwards.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overindulge in pizza on the weekends.
meanings.sent3: After overindulging in ice cream, she regretted not stopping sooner.
meanings.sent4: His overindulging in video games led to neglecting his responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overindulging in snacks were evident on her waistline.

meanings.definition: To give oneself too much of something enjoyable, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: They were overindulging in the buffet at the party.
meanings.sent2: She knew she was overindulging in chocolate but couldn't resist.
meanings.sent3: The cat was overindulging in catnip and acting silly.
meanings.sent4: Overindulging in gossip can lead to misunderstandings and hurt feelings.
meanings.sent5: The children were overindulging in laughter and joy during the playtime.
